• Why

BE THE INTERNET

Join the decentralization movement and empower a new paradigm for technology, humanity and our planet.

Powering the next Technological Era

Today's Internet is highly inefficient, unsustainable, exploits user data, and is extremely centralized. ThreeFold started from scratch, and built the Internet infrastructure the worlds need for exponential evolution.

Learn More

A model in which anyone can partake

Enabling a simple way for anyone to partake in the Internet economy. All you need to get started is a node, plug it into an electricity outlet, and to connect it to your network coverage.

Learn More

The most powerful nodes

Get your 3Node now to connect compute and storage capacity on the edge. Our lightwieght & autonomous operating system empowers the builders of the Internet with more freedom, performance & sustainability.

Learn More

The Token of the Internet

The ThreeFold Token is used to reserve compute & capacity on the ThreeFold Grid. Dive into the Tokenomics of the medium of exchange of the new Internet economy.

Learn More
